title: one thing i really really dont like about zac (the champion)
body:
his splash art, it looks really gross on the loading screen with sections of his face looking like snot and stuff.
puts me off a bit when I get into a game with one.
 thoughts?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Crusader charlie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lszefPTr,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-26T01:50:41.047+0000)
>
> his splash art, it looks really gross on the loading screen with sections of his face looking like snot and stuff.
> puts me off a bit when I get into a game with one.
>  thoughts?

Zac is now a gross looking champion? What is wrong with people these days...

He is a goop monster he isn't meant to look good, even though that's his belief

"Its not about how much you can lift, It's about how good you look"
How about play the game? Oh noooooo this champion looks different. Totally don't wanna play this game now.. Hey, that's fine. I remember when I was a cod fanboy

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lszefPTr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-26T23:28:08.111+0000)
>
> How about play the game? Oh noooooo this champion looks different. Totally don't wanna play this game now.. Hey, that's fine. I remember when I was a cod fanboy

um, I know this may sound real crazy to you. but there's a thing that happens once in a while where If a person doesn't like something they can get over it? I mean, you know, considering I only see a zac once every 50 games, I kind of have this crazy realization in my mind saying "hey, I could play this game anyway!"

as unthinkable to you as that might seem, it's the most amazing observation.

> [{quoted}](name=Crusader charlie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lszefPTr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-26T23:52:47.162+0000)
>
> um, I know this may sound real crazy to you. but there's a thing that happens once in a while where If a person doesn't like something they can get over it? I mean, you know, considering I only see a zac once every 50 games, I kind of have this crazy realization in my mind saying "hey, I could play this game anyway!"
> 
> as unthinkable to you as that might seem, it's the most amazing observation.

"puts me off a bit when I get into a game with one."

Well, you kinda said it puts you off the game though.

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lszefPTr,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-02-27T00:57:27.009+0000)
>
> "puts me off a bit when I get into a game with one."
> 
> Well, you kinda said it puts you off the game though.

my bad, I should probably triple check my posts before I put them out hah.

nah any other part of him apart from where his nose would be looks fine , even if its goopy but that discolouration is just.. yeuch..
even if they recoloured that section or something I would feel a lot better.

Try not looking at him. I understand the pain but no one at Riot is willing to put a few hours work into a new splash art because one player in a "lesser region" (Yea, that's what those NA/EU scumbags see us as xD) doesn't like it.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkLorde117,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lszefPTr,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-02-26T04:39:59.648+0000)
>
> Try not looking at him. I understand the pain but no one at Riot is willing to put a few hours work into a new splash art because one player in a "lesser region" (Yea, that's what those NA/EU scumbags see us as xD) doesn't like it.

I understand, I was just havin a %%%%% haha
Can't see what you think is wrong with him.. But damn is that voice of his sexy.. so sexy it could almost be an ice-cream flavour.
